solidstack.template
Class Template

java.lang.Object
  solidstack.template.Template
Direct Known Subclasses:
GroovyTemplate, JavaScriptTemplate
public abstract class Template
extends Object

A compiled template.

Author:
René M. de Bloois

Constructor Detail

Template

public Template()
Method Detail

setLoader

protected void setLoader(TemplateLoader loader)
Sets the loader that loaded this template. The template needs this to access the MIME type registry.

Parameters:
loader - The template loader.

getLoader

public TemplateLoader getLoader()
Returns:
The loader that loaded this template.

apply

public void apply(Object params,
                  Writer writer)
Apply the given parameters to the template and writes the result to the given writer.

Parameters:
params - The parameters to be applied.
writer - The result of applying this template is written to this writer.

apply

public void apply(Object params,
                  OutputStream out)
Apply the given parameters to the template and writes the output to the given output stream. The character set used is the one configured in the template. If none is configured the default character encoding of the operating system is used.

Parameters:
params - The parameters to be applied.
out - The result of applying this template is written to this OutputStream.

apply

public String apply(Object params)
Apply the given parameters to the template and returns the result as a string.

Parameters:
params - The parameters to be applied.
Returns:
The result of applying this template.

apply

public abstract void apply(Object params,
                           EncodingWriter writer)
Applies the given parameters to the template and writes the output to the given encoding writer.

Parameters:
params - The parameters to apply to the template.
writer - The writer to write the result to.
